item.description: Dr. Allan Hughes will once again be leading this teleseminar based on Rajinder Singh's book, Empowering Your Soul through Meditation. The book explores the power and energy of the soul that is within everyone and how we can use it to transform our lives. It awakens us to the "empowered soul" and its rich qualities such as unlimited wisdom, fearlessness, immortality, unconditional love, connectedness and bliss. This is a teleseminar: call number is number is 712.432.3900; access code is 1617505#.
item.how_to_find_us: This is a teleseminar: call in number is number is 712.432.3900; access code is 1617505#.
